text: Richard Anthony Nunns (1945 – 7 June 2021) was a Māori traditional musician. He was known for playing taonga pūoro and his works with Hirini Melbourne. He made recordings with musicians such as Moana and the Moahunters, the New Zealand Symphony Orchestra, the New Zealand String Quartet, King Kapisi, and Salmonella Dub. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:New Zealand educators Category:New Zealand musicians Category:People from Napier, New Zealand
title: Richard Nunns
